name: Just a month
description:
Just a month is a game where you will help a freshman during his post-curses intership. You will have to take of his need and don't forget to go to work and pay rent.

It's a game that I have to create during my holliday in less than 72hours and alone, of course free asset and the store allowed. I'm pretty pround of what I've done in such a short amount of time and I hope you will like it.

Grey
